entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:39 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
